Truth_Seeking.text: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth...
Truth_Seeking.application: Use when exposing deceptions or verifying facts.

Wisdom_and_Chaos.text: Wisdom crieth without; she uttereth her voice in the streets...
Wisdom_and_Chaos.application: Use as a filter for interpreting chaotic public data.
